frontmatter.excerpt1: Developed a Firefox browser extension that scrapes usage data from MOOC platforms.
frontmatter.excerpt2: Built Using NodeJS running on free GCP AppEngine. Converts JSON data into SQL for storage
frontmatter.excerpt3: Designed Python scripts to generate recommendations from the collected data by predicting FSLSM styles.
frontmatter.title: (Research) Firefox Browser Extension for MOOC Ontology Based Recommendations

frontmatter.excerpt1: Full featured production ready electronic testing system which provides a platform for teachers to conduct online tests efficiently. Developed as per the custom requirements of my instructors at my undergrad college.
frontmatter.excerpt2: Contains 20 AJAX APIs built using NodeJS Express and Nginx. Uses MySQL as the database layer.
frontmatter.excerpt3: The frontend is built using HTML5/CSS3 based Metro UI. Uses Memcached for session encryption.
frontmatter.title: Evaluation System Project

frontmatter.excerpt1: Developed during my internship at Xu Labs, CMU to aid zooming into and slicing a tomograph model stored as a MRC file.
frontmatter.excerpt2: The tool has Django backend and makes use of libraries such as VTK, mayavi and django2_resumable. For frontend CSS3 is used.
frontmatter.excerpt3: The model can be either uploaded for exploration, or an existing model can be selected from the library.
frontmatter.title: AITOM GUI MRC Loader
